description: Try our easy to follow Fried Pudding Dumplings With Caramel Sauce And Ice Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried Pudding Dumplings With Caramel Sauce And Ice Cream
name: Fried Pudding Dumplings With Caramel Sauce And Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a small saucepan of oil to 180°C. Deep-fry pudding balls in batches for 3 minutes or until golden and pastry is cooked through. Remove and drain on paper towel. Dust with icing sugar and serve with caramel sauce and ice cream.
